summary:
Description:
This mod adds Arc's robes from Final Fantasy III. Adds The Colors Black , Grey , Purple , Reddish
The mod includes Boots, Gloves and Robes for female.
descriptionHtml:
Description:
This mod adds Arc's robes from Final Fantasy III. Adds The Colors Black , Grey , Purple , Reddish
The mod includes Boots, Gloves and Robes for female.

[youtube]TzaL00Dg1pI[/youtube]

Requirements:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45538/]FFIII Arc Robes[/url] by Gimora
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url] by dimon99


Download These Amazing Music
[url=https://archive.org/download/onorezdiLP013/onorezdiLP013_vbr_mp3.zip][img]https://ia801000.us.archive.org/16/items/onorezdiLP013/JUST%20LISTEN%20AV10%20pt2%20-%20INSTRUMENTAL%20VS%20DUB.jpg[/img][/url]
([url=https://archive.org/download/onorezdiLP013/onorezdiLP013_vbr_mp3.zip]Here[/url])(Optional)
How to get:
Boots, Gloves and Robes are craft-able under Leather category or Misc category.

Item IDs:
Arc Boots:XX000D62
Arc Robes Blue:XX0012CE
Arc Robes Green:XX0012CD
Arc Robes Red:XX000D63
Arc Gloves:XX000D64

Version History:
v1.0 Added Editions
Initial release.

Credits and Thanks:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45538/]FFIII Arc Robes[/url] by Gimora
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url] by dimon99
